metadata.title: CVE-2024-57936 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:RDMA/bnxt_re: Fix max SGEs for the Work RequestGen P7 supports up to 13 SGEs for now. WQE software structurecan hold only 6 now. Since the max send sge is reported as13, the stack can give requests up to 13 SGEs. This is causingtraffic failures and system crashes.Use the define for max SGE supported for variable size. Thiswill work for both static and variable WQEs.

criterions.comment: linux package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
